# RegularExpressionHelper.IsValidPath method

Determines whether *value* is a valid path.

```csharp
public static bool IsValidPath(string value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Path to check. |

## Return Value

true if path is valid; otherwise, false.
